verses.verse: ( How Pleasant to Live in Harmony!) ( 530 1:10-17 ;  560 4:1-16 ) שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> šîr A song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ of ascents. לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David. הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin·nêh Behold, מַה־ <WH4100> mah- how טּ֭וֹב <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ good וּמַה־ <WH4100> ū·mah- and נָּעִ֑ים <WH5273> nā·‘îm pleasant it is שֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> še·ḇeṯ live אַחִ֣ים <WH251> ’a·ḥîm brothers גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- when יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> yā·ḥaḏ together in harmony!

כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> kaš·še·men oil הַטּ֨וֹב׀ <WH2896> haṭ·ṭō·wḇ It is like fine עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on הָרֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> hā·rōš the head, יֹרֵ֗ד <WH3381> yō·rêḏ running down עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on הַזָּקָ֥ן <WH2206> haz·zā·qān the beard, זְקַֽן־ <WH2206> zə·qan- beard אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron’s שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד <WH3381> yō·rêḏ running down עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over פִּ֥י <WH6310> pî the collar מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4060> mid·dō·w·ṯāw of his robes.

כְּטַל־ <WH2919> kə·ṭal- It is like the dew חֶרְמ֗וֹן <WH2768> ḥer·mō·wn of Hermon שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ <WH3381> še·yō·rêḏ falling עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on הַרְרֵ֪י <WH2042> har·rê the mountains צִ֫יּ֥וֹן <WH6726> ṣî·yō·wn of Zion. כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî For שָׁ֨ם׀ <WH8033> šām there צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> ṣiw·wāh has bestowed יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> hab·bə·rā·ḵāh the blessing חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> ḥay·yîm of life עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- forevermore הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> hā·‘ō·w·lām ....
